Ira Silverman Railroad Menu Collection--Series 2. Atchison, Topeka, and Santa Fe Railway Company--Sub-Series 1. Menus
Atchison, Topeka, and Santa Fe Railway Company

Items on menu: Lunch; Children's Menu; Appetizers and Soups; Salads; Desserts; Beverage list ; Meals served: Lunch. Representative dishes: Our Chef's Special Salad Bowl: A Combination of Crisp Lettuce, Romaine and Escarole, Topped with Wedges of Tomato, Julienne of Ham and Cheese, Hard Boiled Egg, Lorenzo Dressing, Luncheon Rolls, Choice of Dessert and Beverage ($2.35). Braised Short Ribs of Choice Beef. Oven Browned Potato, Fresh Spinach, Anglaise; Mixed Green Salad, Lorenzo Dressing; Luncheon Rolls, Choice of Dessert and Beverage ($2.80)

Homepage at Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections

The Ira Silverman Railroad Menu Collection consists of 238 items: 227 menus and eleven pamphlets. 35 United States and Canadian railroads are represented in the collection. All menus were issued by their respective railroad.
